title: How to Add a Subscribe Button to Your YouTube Videos

steps.headline: Click Channel.
steps.description: Then click on Branding ("Add a Watermark" feature).

steps.headline: Choose your photo logo or icon.
Click Browse.
steps.description: Choose the file that you want to use as your subscribe button. You can choose your photo logo or an icon.

steps.headline: Click "Save".
steps.description: There will now appear a subscribe button for each one of your YouTube videos.

tyn: Photo, if using that as the logo
text: Go to the YouTube website. It's located at: https://www.youtube.com/. Sign into your channel.  Click "Video Manager".  Click Channel. Then click on Branding ("Add a Watermark" feature). Choose your photo logo or icon.  Click Browse. Choose the file that you want to use as your subscribe button. You can choose your photo logo or an icon. Click "Save". There will now appear a subscribe button for each one of your YouTube videos.
sentences: Then click on Branding ("Add a Watermark" feature).
Choose your photo logo or icon.
Choose the file that you want to use as your subscribe button.
You can choose your photo logo or an icon.
There will now appear a subscribe button for each one of your YouTube videos.
